RESOURCE.NAME: Text Categorization PR
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Classify text based on a semantic space

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name for the annotation set used for input

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name for the output annotation set

PARAMETER.NAME: outputAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The type of annotations produced. If this is the same as inputAnnotationType, and the input and output annotation sets are the same, then no new annotations will be created. The output feature value will simply be added to the input annotations.

PARAMETER.NAME: modelURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the LIBLINEAR model used for classification

PARAMETER.NAME: categoriesURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: A comma-separated file containing the category name and, optionally, a custom probability threshold for that category.

PARAMETER.NAME: outputFeatureName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name feature of the feature on the output annotations that stores the class.

PARAMETER.NAME: sematicSpaceURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: URL for the file containing the serialized semantic space. This must be a local file:// URL.

PARAMETER.NAME: stopWordsURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: URL to a file containing stop words, one on each line, using UTF-8.

PARAMETER.NAME: inputFeatureName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The feature on the token annotations used to collect the text for each input annotation.

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process
